description.displayText: Sarahy has been working part-time for our family taking care of our two kids. From the beginning she was able to manage their schedules, care for them, prepare their meals and even help with light housekeeping for all kid related spaces. She has great communication skills and was very flexible with our needs, coming extra days as kids didn't attend school at short notice. We appreciated her commitment and reliability and recommend her truly. We know whoever hires Sarahy will be very happy they found her.
description.originalText: Sarahy has been working part-time for our family taking care of our two kids. From the beginning she was able to manage their schedules, care for them, prepare their meals and even help with light housekeeping for all kid related spaces. She has great communication skills and was very flexible with our needs, coming extra days as kids didn't attend school at short notice. We appreciated her commitment and reliability and recommend her truly. We know whoever hires Sarahy will be very happy they found her.

description.displayText: Sarahy was wonderful with our 2YO. They had a great time playing imaginary games, drawing, and going outside to the park. Sarahy was flexible, dependable, and immediately put us all at ease. I'd recommend her for to anyone looking for a caregiver for their children.
